name: ROSETTA OIL, INC., Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Board of Finance and Revenue, Appellant

parties: ROSETTA OIL, INC., Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Board of Finance and Revenue, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order and Opinion of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
676 A.2d 1193
ROSETTA OIL, INC., Appellee, v. COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Board of Finance and Revenue, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 19, 1996.
